text: The Ratcatcher is name of two fictional supervillains appearing in American comic books and other media published by DC Comics. The character first appeared in Detective Comics #585 (April 1988) and was created by Alan Grant, John Wagner, and Norm Breyfogle. He is an enemy of Batman. == Fictional character biography == He is a rat-catcher in Gotham City and known as Otis Flannegan. He called himself the Ratcatcher because of his special powers to talk with and train rats. == In other media == A female version of the character named Cleo Cazo / Ratcatcher 2 appears in the DC Extended Universe movie The Suicide Squad (2021), portrayed by Daniela Melchior. Taika Waititi portrays the first Ratcatcher, Cleo's father. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1988 Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics supervillains
title: Ratcatcher (comics)
